name: Little Pumpk
description:
A 3D-platformer made by two first-year game design students. 

Play as Little Pumpk who just wants to be a rad little pumpkin boy. One day while he was out partying in the LSTree, his pumpkin patch got taken over by The Evil Squash. Find your way through the forest and save your home patch!

(If there is no sound in level 2, adjust the volume slider in the menu)
